title: Army ordnance
brief_description: Describes the functions of Ordnance in the Australian Army; how it supplies ammunition, transport, clothing, etc. Explains how equipment is manufactured by private firms and is thoroughly checked by Ordnance men before being sent to depots for storage. Shows the procedure for dealing with an order from receipt to final despatch.
